name: Frogger smashy road: Tap the Frog and Jump Froggy
name_original: Frogger smashy road: Tap the Frog and Jump Froggy
description:
Cross Road Froggy is about a hungry frog who is after his cricket meal which is on the other side of the street! Help Frogger cross the roads and lakes, and make sure he survives it in one piece! Its not that simple, Get ready for exciting fun challenge. With the large cars and busses all over it won't be easy, I'm telling you!!



- Un-blockable vehicles!!
- Single Player & Multiplayer Coming Soon
- Random generated levels
- Brown, Pink & Black Environments
- Turn on/off music and sound effects
- Frog jumps across the road and traffic
- Great visuals and froggy sound

We would love to hear from you. Please email suggestions at m.nadeemunawar@gmail.com
